notable_items.name: Cainhurst Badge
notable_items.description: Unlocks Cainhurst Set, Chikage, Evelyn, and Numbing Mist
notable_items.how_to_get: Speak to Annalise and join the Vilebloods Covenant.

notable_items.name: Cosmic Eye Watcher Badge
notable_items.description: Unlocks Rosmarinus, Poison Knife, Sedative, Twin Bloodstone Shards, Beast Blood Pellet, and Blue Elixir
notable_items.how_to_get: Down a side hallway of the building left of the lantern when spawning in.
notes: There is a brainsucker nearby this item.

notable_items.name: Crow Hunter Badge
notable_items.description: Unlocks Crowfeather Set and Blades of Mercy
notable_items.how_to_get: Complete the questline of, or kill Eileen.

notable_items.name: Firing Hammer Badge
notable_items.description: Unlocks Piercing Rifle, Delayed Molotov, and Delayed Rope Molotov
notable_items.how_to_get: Complete the questline of, or kill Eileen.

notable_items.name: Old Hunter Badge
notable_items.description: Unlocks Burial Blade and Gehrman's Set
notable_items.how_to_get: Kill Gehrman.

notable_items.name: Powder Keg Hunter Badge
notable_items.description: Unlocks Stake Driver, Rifle Speak, and Rope Molotov
notable_items.how_to_get: Kill Djura or tell him you'll spare the beasts.

notable_items.name: Radiant Sword Hunter's Badge
notable_items.description: Unlocks Ludwig's Holy Blade, Ludwig's Rifle, Flame Sprayer, Fire Paper, Bone Marrow Ash, and the Tomb Prospector Set.
notable_items.how_to_get: In a chest on the third floor, next to a stairway leading through a thin doorway.

notable_items.name: Saw Hunter Badge
notable_items.description: Unlocks Saw Cleaver, Hunter Axe, Threaded Cane, Saw Spear, Hunter Pistol, and Hunter Blunderbuss
notable_items.how_to_get: Behind the boar at the end of the sewer section.
notes: This unlocks all the starting weapons.

notable_items.name: Spark Hunter Badge
notable_items.how_to_get: Defeat Darkbeast Paarl.

notable_items.name: Sword Hunter Badge
notable_items.description: Unlocks Kirkhammer, Repeating Pistol, Hunter Chief Emblem, Bold Hunter's Mark, and Antidote
notable_items.how_to_get: Defeat the Cleric Beast.

notable_items.name: Wheel Hunter Badge
notable_items.description: Unlocks Logarius' Wheel and Gold Ardeo
notable_items.how_to_get: Complete Alfred's questline, or kill him after defeating Vicar Amelia.

notable_items.name: Ashen Hunter Set
notable_items.how_to_get: Purchase with insight after killing Djura.

notable_items.name: Black Church Set
notable_items.how_to_get: Found in the foggy street where Arianna can be found.

notable_items.name: Bone Ash Set
notable_items.description: Armor of the Keeper of the Old Lords
notable_items.how_to_get: Purchase with insight after killing the Keeper of the Old Lords in the Chalice Dungeon.

notable_items.name: Brador's Set
notable_items.how_to_get: Each of the pieces is found after encountering Brador. Three times in the Hamlet, and once outside his cell.

notable_items.name: Butcher Set
notable_items.how_to_get: Found by the church, in a hidden passage to the right of the nearby pool of blood.

notable_items.name: Cainhurst Set
notable_items.how_to_get: Purchase after obtaining the Cainhurst Badge.

notable_items.name: Charred Hunter Set
notable_items.how_to_get: On a chair located on a rooftop after a series of drops. Start from the intermediate platform leading to Djura.

notable_items.name: Choir Set
notable_items.how_to_get: The cap is found in a shortcut of the area. The rest of the set is found in the first room of the first building in the area.

notable_items.name: Constable Set
notable_items.how_to_get: The helm is obtained by joining the League, crushing five Vermin, then speaking to Valtr. Each remaining piece is found in the nightmare.

notable_items.name: Common Yharnam Set
notable_items.how_to_get: Found in an alley surrounded by crows in the shortcut leading from the Abandoned Old Workshop.

notable_items.name: Crowfeather Set
notable_items.how_to_get: Purchase after obtaining the Crow Hunter Badge.

notable_items.name: Decorative Old Hunter Set
notable_items.how_to_get: The headpiece is found in the house leading to the river of blood. The rest of the set is found in the Research Hall, in the room with two elevators and two wheelchair enemies.

notable_items.name: Doll Set
notable_items.how_to_get: Found in a chest.

notable_items.name: Executioner Set
notable_items.how_to_get: The Helmet is purchased after obtaining the Wheel Hunter Badge. The remaining pieces are found after the elevator shortcut, at the end of a statue-filled balcony.

notable_items.name: Foreign Set
notable_items.how_to_get: Default Apparel.

notable_items.name: Gascoigne's Set
notable_items.how_to_get: Purchase with insight after killing Gascoigne.

notable_items.name: Gehrman's Set
notable_items.how_to_get: Purchase after obtaining the Old Hunter Badge

notable_items.name: Graveyard Set
notable_items.how_to_get: Found in two parts in the second half of the area, on the other side of a gap you must jump across.

notable_items.name: Harrowed Set
notable_items.how_to_get: Inside the building near the ladder shortcut.

notable_items.name: Henryk's Set
notable_items.how_to_get: Purchase with insight after killing Henryk.

notable_items.name: Hunter Set
notable_items.how_to_get: The caped with cap version is found in the Yharnam sewers, reached through a drop from a nearby area of Central Yharnam. The non-caped with top hat version is found after exiting Oedon Chapel, under a tree with a nearby Amygdala.

notable_items.name: Knight Set
notable_items.how_to_get: Found in a secret area up the elevator shortcut, down a drop after exiting through a window.

notable_items.name: Madman Set
notable_items.how_to_get: Purchase after defeating the Madman in the Chalice dungeons

notable_items.name: Maria's Set
notable_items.how_to_get: Purchase with insight after killing Lady Maria.

notable_items.name: Old Hunter Set
notable_items.how_to_get: Each piece is found within the first area of the nightmare.

notable_items.name: Student Set
notable_items.how_to_get: The cloaked version is inside a Byrgenwerth chest. The cloakless version is in an auditorium of the Lecture Building.

notable_items.name: Tomb Prospector Set
notable_items.how_to_get: Purchase after obtaining the Radiant Sword Hunter Badge

notable_items.name: White Church Set
notable_items.how_to_get: On a rooftop, near the path to the Clinic back route.

notable_items.name: Yahar'Gul Set
notable_items.how_to_get: On a body atop a cart before the plaza gates.

notable_items.name: Yamamura's Set
notable_items.how_to_get: Kill Yamamura.

notable_items.name: Yharnam Hunter Set
notable_items.how_to_get: Purchase at any time.

notable_items.name: Clockwise Metamorphosis
notable_items.area: Forbidden Woods / Nightmare Frontier / Ptheumeru Ihyll Root Chalice
how_to_get: I is found behind a locked gate after the Shadows of Yharnam.
II is found in a cave across the Nightmare Frontier's stone bridge.
III is found randomly in the Ptheumeru Ihyll Root Chalice.

notable_items.name: Anti-Clockwise Metamorphosis
notable_items.area: Forbidden Woods / Lecture Hall / Lower Ailing Loran Chalice
how_to_get: I is found after a group of Kin in the Forbidden Woods.
II is found by speaking with Patches in his room.
III is found in the Lower Ailing Loran Chalice.

notable_items.name: Arcane Lake
how_to_get: I is found on a corpse near some slugs.
II is found near a Brainsucker.
III is found randomly in the Isz Root Chalice

notable_items.name: Beast
notable_items.description: Boosts the effect of Beast Blood Pellets
notable_items.area: Healing Church Workshop / Forbidden Woods / Lower Ailing Loran Root Chalice
how_to_get: I is dropped by the Beast-Possessed Soul at the end of the shortcut to Cathedral Ward.
II is dropped by the Suspicious Beggar.
III is found randomly in the Lower Ailing Loran Root Chalice

notable_items.name: Blood Rapture
notable_items.area: Forbidden Woods / Cursed and Defiled Root Chalice / Cathedral Ward
how_to_get: I is dropped by the Shadows of Yharnam.
II is found randomly in the Cursed and Defiled Root Chalice.
III is dropped by the Bloody Crow of Cainhurst at the end of Eileen's quest.

notable_items.name: Clawmark
notable_items.area: Yahar'Gul / Central Yharnam / Lower Ailing Loran Root Chalice
how_to_get: I is dropped from one of the three NPC hunters.
II is dropped by Gilbert after defeating Rom.
III is found randomly in the Lower Ailing Loran Root Chalice.

notable_items.name: Clear Deep Sea
notable_items.area: Forbidden Woods / Nightmare Frontier / Lower Ailing Loran Root Chalice
how_to_get: I is found behind a large gravestone.
II is found behind a rock thrower on top of a hill.
III is found randomly in the Lower Ailing Loran Root Chalice.

notable_items.name: Communion
notable_items.area: Cathedral Ward / Lecture Hall / Iosefka's Clinic / Upper Cathedral Ward / Pthumeru Ihyll Root Chalice
how_to_get: I is found on the way to the Healing Church Workshop.
II is found in a chest.
III is found in a chest.
IV is dropped by the Celestial Emissary.
V is found randomly in the Pthumeru Ihyll Root Chalice.

notable_items.name: Deep Sea
notable_items.area: Lower Hintertomb Root Chalice / Forbidden Woods / Isz Root Chalice
how_to_get: I is found randomly in the Lower Hintertomb Root Chalice.
II is found near two viper pits.
III is found randomly in the Isz Root Chalice.

notable_items.name: Dissipating Lake
notable_items.area: Forbidden Woods / Ailing Loran Root Chalice / Lower Ailing Loran Root Chalice
how_to_get: I is found under some roots in the mud section.
II is found randomly in the Ailing Loran Root Chalice.
III is found randomly in the Lower Ailing Loran Root Chalice.

notable_items.name: Eye
notable_items.area: Nightmare of Mensis / Byrgenwerth / Isz Root Chalice
how_to_get: I is found near the Mergo's Loft: Base lamp.
II is dropped by Master Willem.
III is found randomly in the Isz Root Chalice.

notable_items.name: Fading Lake
notable_items.area: Nightmare Frontier / Ailing Loran Root Chalice / Lower Ailing Loran Root Chalice
how_to_get: I is on a narrow cliff near the Bell-Ringing Woman.
II is found randomly in the Ailing Loran Root Chalice.
III is found randomly in the Lower Ailing Loran Root Chalice.

notable_items.name: Formless Oedon
notable_items.area: Iosefka's Clinic / Lower Pthumeru Root Chalice / Cathedral Ward / Healing Church Workshop / Pthumeru Ihyll Root Chalice
how_to_get: I is dropped by a Kin if Gascoigne's Daughter was sent to the clinic.
II is found randomly in the Lower Pthumeru Root Chalice.
III is dropped by the Chapel Dweller.
IV is found in a secret passage halfway up the elevator ride.
V is found randomly in the Pthumeru Ihyll Root Chalice.

notable_items.name: Great Deep Sea
notable_items.area: Lower Hintertomb Root Chalice / Nightmare Frontier / Isz Root Chalice
how_to_get: I is found randomly in the Lower Hintertomb Root Chalice.
II is found in a narrow passage of the poison swamp.
III is found randomly in the Isz Root Chalice.

notable_items.name: Great Lake
notable_items.area: Lower Hintertomb Root Chalice / Upper Cathedral Ward / Isz Root Chalice
how_to_get: I is found randomly in the Lower Hintertomb Root Chalice.
II is found at the top of some stairs after the lamp, on the right.
III is found randomly in the Isz Root Chalice.

notable_items.name: Guidance
how_to_get: I is dropped by a Carrion Crow at the top of the research hall.
II is dropped by Ludwig.

notable_items.name: Heir
notable_items.description: Raises blood echoes gained from Visceral Attacks
notable_items.area: Central Yharnam / Yahar'Gul / Pthumeru Ihyll Root Chalice
how_to_get: I is dropped by Henryk.
II is found on a corpse in a room with a wheelchair, troll, and werewolf.
III is found randomy in the Pthumeru Ihyll Root Chalice.

notable_items.name: Lake
notable_items.area: Hemwick Charnel Lake / Cursed and Defiled Root Chalice / Pthumeru Ihyll Root Chalice
how_to_get: I is found at the edge of a collapsed bridge, surrounded by dogs.
II is found randomly in the Cursed and Defiled Root Chalice.
III is found randomly in the Pthumeru Ihyll Root Chalice.

notable_items.name: Moon
notable_items.description: Raises blood echoes dropped from enemies
notable_items.area: Yahar'Gul's Hypogean Gaol / Nightmare of Mensis / Nightmare of Mensis
how_to_get: I is downstairs of the lamp, guarded by two Kidnappers.
II is found in Micolash's boss room.
III is given by the Brain of Mensis after Making Contact.

notable_items.name: Oedon Writhe
notable_items.area: Yahar'Gul's Hypogean Gaol / Iosefka's Clinic / Pthumeru Ihyll Root Chalice
how_to_get: I is dropped by Adella.
II is dropped by Iosefka if Rom has not yet been killed.
III is found randomly in the Ptheumeru Ihyll Root Chalice.

notable_items.name: Stunning Deep Sea
notable_items.area: Lower Hintertomb Root Chalice / Nightmare Frontier / Lower Ailing Loran Root Chalice
how_to_get: I is found randomly in the Lower Hintertomb Root Chalice.
II is found after a jump in the area where two NPC hunters invade.
III is found randomly in the Lower Ailing Loran Root Chalice.

notable_items.name: Beast's Embrace
notable_items.description: Raises beasthood when using the Beast Claw
notable_items.how_to_get: Dropped by Laurence

notable_items.name: Corruption
notable_items.description: Continually heals 1 HP when near death. Blood Dregs can drop.
notable_items.how_to_get: Join the Vilebloods

notable_items.name: Hunter
notable_items.description: Increases stamina recovery speed by 10%. Co-op may become PvP.
notable_items.how_to_get: Complete Eileen's questline.

notable_items.name: Impurity
notable_items.description: Raises max health by 2% in Co-op. Vermin can drop.
notable_items.how_to_get: Join the League

notable_items.name: Milkweed
notable_items.description: Raises discovery by 10. Transforms user into a Lampwood.
notable_items.how_to_get: Complete Saint Adeline's questline.
notes: Unlocks the Kos Parasite's true potential.

notable_items.name: Radiance
notable_items.description: Raises health recovered from blood vials by 2%.
notable_items.how_to_get: Complete Alfred's Questline and loot it from his corpse.

notable_items.name: Third Umbilical Cord
notable_items.description: Partial umbilical cord of an infant Great One.
notable_items.area: Abandoned Old Workshop / Iosefka's Clinic / Cathedral Ward / Nightmare of Mensis
how_to_get: One is found on the rune altar of the Abandoned Old Workshop.
One is dropped from Imposter Iosefka after killing Rom.
One is dropped from Arianna's infant after killing Rom.
One is dropped by Mergo's Wet Nurse.

notable_items.name: Cainhurst Summons
notable_items.description: A summons to Cainhurst Castle. It bears your name.
notable_items.how_to_get: Found in a room in the back of the clinic.

notable_items.name: Eye of a Blood-Drunk Hunter
notable_items.how_to_get: Given by messengers after killing Vicar Amelia.

notable_items.name: Tonsil Stone
how_to_get: Obtained from Patches at an NPC door after entering the Forbidden Woods.
The easiest spot to find him is at Gilbert's window, by the Central Yharnam Lamp.
Another easy spot is behind the house on the way to the Hemwick Charnel Lake shortcut elevator.

notable_items.name: Small Hair Ornament
notable_items.how_to_get: Found on a shelf next to the storage area.

notable_items.name: Upper Cathedral Key
notable_items.description: A key to the Upper Cathedral Ward.
notable_items.how_to_get: Found on a corpse in a caged room.

tips: Save your fire paper for this fight
